mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.branch AS "branch", a.kepperby AS "kepperby", a.year AS "year", a.month AS "month"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM aom_kaoqin a
AND a.branch LIKE '%'||#{branch}||'%' '%'+#{branch}+'%' concat('%',#{branch},'%')
AND a.kepperby LIKE '%'||#{kepperby}||'%' '%'+#{kepperby}+'%' concat('%',#{kepperby},'%')
AND a.year LIKE '%'||#{year}||'%' '%'+#{year}+'%' concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND a.month LIKE '%'||#{month}||'%' '%'+#{month}+'%' concat('%',#{month},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO aom_kaoqin( id, branch, kepperby, year, month ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{branch}, #{kepperby}, #{year}, #{month} )
